text:
He is a legendary swordsman, able to best even the great masters...blindfolded.

He rides a valiant steed on to battle...and off into the sunset with the senoritas.

He uses﻿ the magic of the fairies...but is unsure of whether or not he﻿ is a fairy.

He plays the Ocarina...but his can warp the very fabric of time and space.

He is the most interesting Elf in Hyrule.

"I don't always drink...but when I do, I make it a Lon Lon Milk.

Stay thirsty, my Hylians."

text:
In the night, blew a storm
Chasing shadows to the shore,
Lightning filled the sky
Thunder roared and cried.
Close your eyes, come along,
Dance until the night is gone
Singing a song, of storms.

From the sky, to the ground,
Rain is falling all around.
Thunder, rain and wind
a Song of Storms begins.
Play a song, a melody
Then everybody will see
the Hero of Time has come.
author: Naru5000

text:
@robloxianmaster 

Has it? I've yet to play a newer game that has the sheer epicness and badassery OoT still posseses to this day.
I'd say gaming truly peaked in the late 90's, and has been falling and rising continuously since, with a few games approaching this level of quality.
Producers are mostly too concerned with graphics and online multiplayer nowadays, not with making a game's core gameplay good.

author: DatLine

text: I agree that the final hour track was awesome but theres way more notable tracks just as or better than that in OoT. Some of these would be Volvagia's theme, the songs on the ocarina, Ganondorf's Theme, Hyrule Field, The lost woods, Boss Battle, Windmill Hut, Temple of time, the ones you mentioned and even the credits lol
author: shadowstab44

text:
When it comes to terms of music, Ocarina and Majora's Mask are equal. The most notable music of the two in my opinion is Gerudo Valley (OoT) and the Song of Healing (MM).

What i don't understand is you stopped playing possibly the best game ever made because of Hyrule field when your barely even in it for a fraction of the game. This tells me that your quick to judge games. If you had of got a decent ways into the game, you would have found out that YOU GET A HORSE, lol
author: shadowstab44

text:
Most people dont appreciate OoT because they wanna be the odd one out and choose a different game. The truth is OoT  is the best (notice how i say are, not were). 

I agree that Majora's Mask had more feeling (Especially the Kafei event) but when it comes to story, Ocarina knocks MM out of the park. 

WW was good but it just felt too happy ALL the time. WW had the weakest story of those 3, but still had a good story.

text: Dear guest...Long ago, I was in an animal troupe, with dogs and donkeys and such. Why could a..? Why could a..? Why could a man join? That's cause a man is an animal too, my boy! They were all great. But there was one thing I didn't like about it.. Why was the..? Why was the dog the leader? Was it 'cause something was wrong with me, sir?? Oh, that dog was an amazing leader! He always had a stellar troupe no matter what animals he had to work with... That's why I..That's why I stole it. The mask.
